text: Teuma Neukirem gagak le Tuhan Jijak ticem nyan bak bumoe Allah Deungon gakijih jikreh tanoh Jimeung peuleumah pakriban ulah Pakri jitanom adoe jih mate Nyawong hana le ho jime beukas Oh ban jikalon jikheun le meunoe Ceulaka lon nyoe han sapeue keumah Pakon han di lon lonpeugot meunoe Lagee ticem nyoe lon tanom beukas Oh lheuh jitanom meunyesai teuka Han le meuguna â€˜oh dudoe teulah
